text.section: A police record or a court record is subject to expungement under this subtitle.

section.section: A court record or a police record that existed before July 1, 1975, and is still maintained, may be expunged under this subtitle.
A person who is entitled to the expungement of a court record or a police record that existed before July 1, 1975, may use the procedures for expungement provided under this subtitle.
The limitation periods provided in § 10-105 of this subtitle begin when the person becomes entitled to expungement of a court record or a police record that existed before July 1, 1975.

The custodian of court records or police records that were made before July 1, 1975, and that may be expunged under this subtitle:
shall make a reasonable search for a record requested for expungement; but
need not expunge a court record or a police record that is not found after a reasonable search.
